title: Salesman's Sample Book, 1900–1950
inscribed: Stamped on cover: "James G. Hardy & Co. Damask colored."
dimensions: H x W (closed): 62 x 30.5 cm (24 7/16 in. x 12 in.)
description: Bound volume containing twenty samples of square damask napkins – two in monochrome and eighteen in two colors. Each sample has a paper label attached: "James C. Hardy & Co., Linens, Manufacturers and Importers, New York."

tombstone.epitaph:
Salesman's Sample Book, 1900–1950. Medium: linen, paper
Technique: damask. 1983-49-2.
